seniority_level.evidence: 3-5 years experience requirement with responsibilities like incident management and on-call duties suggest mid-level rather than junior, but lack of explicit 'Senior' in title keeps confidence moderate

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ingestion, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on SFTP file transfers, batch data processing, and managed file transfer (MFT) solutions rather than real-time streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team management, or leadership responsibilities - focused on individual technical work and collaboration

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Cloud explicitly listed as required skill in must-have section

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS and GCP mentioned as nice-to-have skills in the nice_to_have_hard_skills array

processing_paradigm.evidence: SFTP file transfers, automated batch transfers, and file monitoring suggest batch processing paradigm rather than streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned - focus is on scripting with Python/Shell for automation rather than formal orchestrators

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or storage systems mentioned - focus is on file transfer mechanisms rather than storage architecture

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite work model specified with Cincinnati, OH location requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: Cincinnati, OH location suggests EST timezone, and on-call duties would require timezone alignment with US operations

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite position in Cincinnati, OH with no remote work options implies relocation would be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, and TCS typically handles visa sponsorship through their internal processes but not explicitly stated

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, and 3-5 years experience requirement suggests preference for experienced candidates

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned, implying only work authorization in US is needed

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type with salary range suggests W2 employee status rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job posting - only salary range provided

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement, or development opportunities mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, senior staff collaboration, or learning opportunities mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career progression mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role rotations, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track information, IC paths, or management paths discussed

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (GoAnywhere, Azure, SFTP) and nice-to-have skills (AWS, GCP), with specific technical requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role specifically on SFTP data engineering with well-defined responsibilities and clear technical scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (3-5 years, SFTP, Azure, scripting) are reasonable and appropriate for mid-level data engineer position
